name: Smashed (GaryD)
description:
• 60 seconds to remove as many tiles as possible.
  • Flick identical tiles together to crush them.
  • Match 3 or more for powerups, lightning bolts, draggers & Colour Changers.
  • Use them to obliterate rows, columns, and matching tiles.
  • Destroy surrounding tiles with bombs.
  • Set up chain reactions for big points.
  • Never ending supply of tiles means there's always something to remove.
  • Go for the big multipliers by continuously removing tiles.
  • Needs extra time? - Play for longer by grabbing to extra time.
  • Tiles = coins - Cash them in for powerups next time.
